description:
When Seiichi rescues Artoria, she’s on the verge of death, so he faces the Black Dragon God himself! Though the frightening strength of the Black Dragon God poses a challenge, he manages to defeat it.
Artoria feels depressed, blaming herself for dragging them into her calamity. She reveals she suffers from a curse that brings misfortune to those around her. After lamenting her fate, she leaves the others. Seiichi follows after her to try and cheer her up, but…
Source: crunchyroll
